quests.title: Investigate the Aftermath of the Storm
quests.description: Multiple groups are being assembled to research the cause and effects of the devastating storm that killed 70% of the population.

npcs.name: Professor Artex
npcs.description: Leonine professor at the Culdor Academy who organizes the research groups.

npcs.name: Pipira Shimmerlock (Pip)
npcs.description: Female gnome wizard, student, curious and loves experiments.

npcs.name: Fan'nar Khe'Lek (Pas'Ta)
npcs.description: Winter Eladrin, muscular, blond, works as a handyman at the academy.

npcs.name: Sha’ek
npcs.description: Cleric in heavy chain mail with green eyes, carrying a large bag and a shield bearing his god’s emblem, searching urgently for someone.

npcs.name: Furnax (Frost Hellhound)
npcs.description: Black and dark blue hellhound companion named by Pip.

plot_hooks.summary: The cause of the catastrophic storm.
plot_hooks.details: The storm killed 70% of the population and is believed to be an act of the gods. The reason behind it remains unexplained.

plot_hooks.summary: The purpose of the investigation stone.
plot_hooks.details: The group receives a stone that can send a message up to 10 minutes long once per day; its exact use and origin are unclear.
The cleric enters the academy looking for someone specific, but no explanation is given.
Furnax was named by Pip; the background of how the creature came to be with the party is not yet revealed.
